verse.name: c1
verse.lines:
I will lift my voice
To worship You my King
I will find my strength
In the shadow of Your wings

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
Your love oh Lord
Reaches to the heavens
Your faithfulness
Stretches to the sky
Your righteousness
Is like the mighty mountains
Your justice flows
Like the ocean's tide

verse.name: e1
verse.lines:
Your love O Lord
Reaches to the heavens
Your faithfulness
Stretches to the sky
